price: Allah amaldiçoou-o. E ele disse: "Certamente, tomarei uma porção preceituada de Teus servos.
arabic: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: laʿanahu al-lahu waqāla la-attakhidhanna min ʿibādika naṣīban mafrūḍan
